Summary: Big Fireball like orbs to the West and south-east of Lebanon, Ohio
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around September 5th 2009
divs: sighting detailsaround 9:20\9:25 pm on sept. 5th my buddy who lives with me left our house. he called me minutes later and told me to look out in the sky. i ran outside and looked to the west toward monroe\middletown, ohio. there were 2 glowing orbs hovering in the sky. they looked like giant fireballs around a third to a half the size of the moon. they werent too far above tree\ house level. within 10-20 seconds they changed. one of them got bigger streaked slightly to the left. when i say streaked it looked like someone just speared the light slightly. it looked as if it was coming toward me in a diagonal direction, as if moving southeast which would leave a steak that i could only see from the front. it did however stay relatively in the same place in the sky, just appearing to get larger and streak\smear slightly to the left. simultaneously the orb directly to the right looked as if it disappeared from the outside to the middle staying in the same spot. it fizzled and appeared to disappear into itself, like it was being flushed down a drain. i assume that it flew away in the opposite direction, causing it to appear to disappear into a point in the center. the other one then drifted out of sight, almost appearing to land but i could only see it disappear behind a house. a plane had been in the sky to the northwest and came toward me, then circled in front of me around the area in which it had disappeared, eventually heading back in the direction it came. i could clearly hear the plane but the only thing were loud pops unlike anything i have heard, but these were not often and did happen after it was no longer in sight. these were definitely the largest thing i have seen in the sky in my life, other than the moon and sun. but they definitely looked like flames. and they were not similar to meteors i have seen. they stayed in one spot until they moved and\or changed irregularly. my buddy, before calling me, saw upwards of 6 of these all just hovering in the sky, not moving. he also said they looked like giant fireballs. and he said it looked as if white sparkles of some sort were dropping off of them. he then saw some of them disappear. he was in the car and called me and watched them as best as he could for the time we were on the phone. ill have him post his sighting. my grandma watched one of these orbs to the south east of lebanon toward waynesville, ohio. she reported watching it for a good 10 to 15 minutes. it was around the general time of my sighting, more than likely before as she said it hadnt been dark long. she said it was like a big fireball flying around the sky. she described it as having a tail behind it, as if it was shooting fire out of it. but it flew in different directions not just from one point to another. it appeared to be throwing off blue and red sparkles. she did hear some kind of pops and did hear an engine noise but could not see a plane or anything else in sight. it eventually disappeared behind some trees. my brother saw 6 similar fireballs in the sky in cincinnati tonight on the 6th and took a relatively useless pic but ill have him post his sighting and pic tomorrow as he is not home yet. he described them as flying around each other and disappearing and reappearing.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
